verses.roman:
vicāri' kavitva kaile haya sunirmala
sālaṅkāra haile artha kare jhalamala

synonyms: vicāri'-with proper consideration; kavitva—poetic explanation; kaile—if done; haya—it becomes; sunirmala—very pure; sa-alaṅkāra—with metaphorical use of words; haile—if it is; artha—meaning; kare—does; jhalamala—dazzle.
translation: "Poetic skill used with due consideration is very pure, and with metaphors and analogies it is dazzling."
